amendment.description: Amendment prohibited use of funds to modify the standards applicable to the determination of the entitlement of veterans to special monthly pensions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to modify the standards applicable to the determination of the entitlement of veterans to special monthly pensions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Wamp.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
